summary: Removes armor rating from the 3 new masks added by the Dragonborn expansion, and changes the models to reduce clipping with other headgears.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the three new dragon priest masks added by the Dragonborn expansion, both graphics-wise and gameplay-wise, in order to better fit mage classes and others who like using them. I got the idea from [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=105836753]this mod[/url], which is pretty damn useful, and I decided to take what that author did and do it with these masks, taking a step further.

[u][b]Note: I did NOT change how Miraak\'s mask at all, I only changed the three lesser masks. I will probably Miraak\'s mask in a different mod, and then only gameplay-wise[/b][/u]

[u][b]Gameplay changes:[/b][/u]
--Removes the armor rating from each mask, allowing mage classes to benefit from the Mage Armor perk, considering that these masks were definitely geared mainly towards magic users.
--The masks now take up the face slot (unnamed slot 44 in the CK), allowing for free use of both circlets and helmets.

[u][b]Graphical changes:[/b][/u]
--The masks no longer have a hood, leaving only the mask itself.
--The masks have been reskinned, to reduce clipping. I used the dragon priest masks from vanilla Skyrim to achieve this. The graphics in the item menu have also been changed to reflect this.
   --Azhidal now uses Volsung\'s graphics.
   --Dukaan now uses Morokei\'s graphics.
   --Zahkriisos now uses Nahkriin\'s graphics.

Installation is easy, just extract the esp and bsa into your Skyrim data folder, or use NMM to install it.
author: Scyantific
